title: Bug 9039New Project Wizard; don't use default 2
description: Deselect "Use default" Select an arbitrary location; say "/test" Select "Use default" again (say you unfortunately missed the text box by afew pixels and hit the check box's label instead  it's just a matter of 10pixels) Deselect "Use default" a second time Observe: "Directory" is empty againOne would expect that Eclipse remembered the last location (at least while thedialog is shown), e.g. "/test", I've entered manually ...
